full_summary:
================

### [Notice]
#### 21520 - 231000 - Assorted Potato Chips and Snacks

  **Reference #:** WS3663128550-Doc3835260862
  **Notice Type:** Request for Standing Offer (RFSO)
  **Modification #:** 1
  **Tender #:** WS3663128550
  **Public Date:** February 23, 2023
  **Deadline:** March 10, 2023 @ 14:00 EST

### Description
This request for standing offers (RFSO) cancels and supersedes the previous RFSO number Doc3750165741 dated September 12, 2022. Correctional Services Canada (CSC) at Saskatchewan Penitentiary in Prince Albert, Saskatchewan requires a standing offer agreement for the supply and delivery of assorted potato chips and snacks to the loading bays of building C33, West End of 15th Street West, Highway 302 West, Saskatchewan Penitentiary.

### Requirements

*   Deliveries must be made as and when required
*   Deliveries must be made within three business days of receipt of the order
*   The supplier shall provide a high-quality product that meets all relevant food safety standards and is compliant with the requirements of CSC.
*   The standing offer agreement is for a period of 5 years.

### Sampling
*   Samples may not be requested
*   Suppliers are expected to provide their products according to the specifications and requirements outlined in the standing offer.

### Evaluation Criteria
Bids will be evaluated based on the lowest price, and the supplier that submits a bid with the lowest price will be awarded the standing offer.

### Important Dates
*   Public date: February 23, 2023
*   Tender closing date: March 10, 2023 @ 14:00 EST
*   Expected contract start date: November 21, 2022
*   Expected contract end date: October 31, 2023

### Contact Information
If you have any inquiries or questions, please contact: Oana Lee (SPAC/PSPC) at oana.lee@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

### Terms of Purchase
This RFSO is conducted under the auspices of the Trade Agreements Act of Canada.

### Available Date
The notice and related information are accessible through the Covered Purchase notice posted on the Ariba Discovery website.
